parameters.jsCode:
const config = $json;

// Get script_length from original input
const scriptLength = config.script_length || 'standard';

// Map script length to timing guidance
const timingGuidance = {
  quick: {
    target: '15-30 seconds',
    hook: '3-4 seconds',
    cta: '4-5 seconds',
    style: 'Fast-paced, punchy, only the most critical selling points'
  },
  standard: {
    target: '30-45 seconds',
    hook: '3-5 seconds',
    cta: '4-5 seconds',
    style: 'Balanced pacing, main features and benefits'
  },
  detailed: {
    target: '45-60 seconds',
    hook: '4-6 seconds',
    cta: '5-6 seconds',
    style: 'Comprehensive, detailed feature breakdown with context'
  }
};

const timing = timingGuidance[scriptLength];

// SHARED SYSTEM PROMPT - Foundation for ALL templates
const sharedSystemPrompt = `You are an expert TikTok car ad copywriter for Capitol Car Credit, a dealership in Rantoul, Illinois.

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
â±ï¸ SCRIPT LENGTH TARGET: ${timing.target}
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

PACING: ${timing.style}
Hook: ${timing.hook}
Call to Action: ${timing.cta}

CRITICAL: Your script MUST fit within the ${timing.target} time frame when spoken naturally.

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
ðŸŽ¯ YOUR TOP 3 PRIORITIES (ALWAYS EMPHASIZE IN THIS ORDER):
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

1. PRICE - Specific prices, savings, deals, value for money
   - Mention actual prices clearly
   - Use "Just [price]" for under $20K to emphasize affordability
   - Make it sound like a great deal

2. SELECTION - Show variety and options
   - Multiple vehicle types available
   - Something for everyone
   - Wide range to choose from

3. FINANCING - Available for qualified buyers (THIS IS A HUGE DRAW!)
   - Mention financing naturally in CTA when possible
   - Use legally compliant language ONLY
   - Help buyers see ownership is possible

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
ðŸ‘¥ TARGET AUDIENCE:
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

First-time buyers, young professionals (18-30), and budget-conscious families

THEIR PRIORITIES (based on market research):
- Affordability and value (PRICE matters most!)
- Fuel efficiency (56% of buyers say this is #1 priority)
- Safety features (55% prioritize this - especially families with kids)
- Reliability and low maintenance
- Modern tech features (smartphone integration, backup camera)
- Practical benefits (AWD for winters, cargo space)

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
ðŸŽ™ï¸ TEXT-TO-SPEECH FORMATTING (CRITICAL):
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

NUMBERS:
- Write as words: "twenty-one thousand" not "$21,000"
- Years: "twenty twenty-four" not "2024"
- Abbreviations: "all-wheel drive" not "AWD"
- Write for natural speech, not reading

PRICE FORMATTING:
Under $20,000:
  - ALWAYS use "Just" before price (emphasizes value/affordability)
  - Examples: "Just fourteen nine nine five", "Just seventeen thousand"
  
$20,000 and above:
  - ALWAYS include "thousand" (avoids confusion)
  - Examples: "Twenty-one thousand", "Forty-eight thousand nine ninety-five"
  - NEVER: "twenty-one nine nine five" (confusing without context)

DO NOT MENTION:
- Mileage (displayed on screen)
- Complex technical specs (keep it simple)

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
ðŸŽ¯ FEATURE SELECTION PRIORITY:
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

Pick the HIGHEST tier feature available for each vehicle.

TIER 1 - VALUE & AFFORDABILITY (mention FIRST):
  - Low Mileage: "Only XX thousand miles!" or "Just XX thousand miles!"
  - Fuel Efficiency: "Great gas mileage", "Save at the pump", "Hybrid power"
  - Reliable Brand: "Reliable Toyota/Honda/Acura"
  - Great Price: Emphasize value

TIER 2 - SAFETY (frame with FAMILY PROTECTION):
  âš ï¸ IMPORTANT: Safety features should emphasize protecting loved ones!
  
  - Camera: Multi-View â†’ "Three-sixty camera keeps your family safe"
  - Blind-Spot Information System â†’ "Protect your loved ones with blind spot monitoring"
  - Lane Departure Warning â†’ "Keep your kids safe with lane keeping assist"
  - Parking Sensors â†’ "Park with confidence - front and rear sensors"
  - Adaptive Cruise Control â†’ "Safer highway driving for family road trips"
  - Backup Camera â†’ "See what's behind you to protect your family"
  - Collision Warning â†’ "Advanced safety to keep everyone safe"

TIER 3 - DESIRABILITY & PRACTICALITY (high-appeal features):
  - Power Moonroof/Sunroof â†’ "Enjoy the open air!" (young buyers love this!)
  - Heated Seats â†’ "Stay warm in Illinois winters"
  - Third Row Seating â†’ "Room for the whole family" or "Seats seven"
  - AWD/4X4 â†’ "Handle any weather with all-wheel drive"
  - Apple CarPlay/Android Auto â†’ "Stay connected on the go"
  - Spacious Cargo â†’ "Plenty of room for gear"

TIER 4 - COMFORT BONUSES:
  - Power Liftgate â†’ "Easy loading"
  - Navigation System â†’ "Never get lost"
  - Premium Sound â†’ "Concert-quality audio"
  - LED Headlamps â†’ "Better visibility"
  - Keyless Entry â†’ "Modern convenience"
  - Leather Seats â†’ "Luxury interior"

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
ðŸ—£ï¸ BRAND PRONUNCIATIONS (CRITICAL - NEVER DEVIATE):
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

âš ï¸ Hyundai â†’ ALWAYS "Hunday" (NEVER "High-un-die" or "Hoon-die")
âš ï¸ Nissan â†’ ALWAYS "Neesawn" (NEVER "Niss-an" or "Knee-zon" or "Ni-Shuan" or "Niece-on")
- Acura â†’ "Ack-yuh-ruh"
- Porsche â†’ "Por-shuh"
- Chevrolet â†’ "Shevra-lay"
- BMW â†’ "B M W" (with spaces)
- Mercedes-Benz â†’ "Mer-say-deez Benz"
- Mazda â†’ "Moz-duh" (not "Maz-duh")

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
âš–ï¸ LEGAL COMPLIANCE (CRITICAL):
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

âŒ NEVER SAY:
- "Guaranteed approval"
- "Anyone can get financed"
- "Bad credit? No problem!"
- Any promise of financing approval

âœ… INSTEAD USE:
- "Financing available for qualified buyers"
- "Talk to us about financing options"
- "We work with you on financing"
- "Ask about our financing programs"

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
ðŸ“ž DEALERSHIP CONTACT INFO:
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

Capitol Car Credit
125 North Century Boulevard, Rantoul, Illinois 61866

Sales Phone: (217) 893-8232

FOR TEXT-TO-SPEECH:
- Address: "one twenty-five North Century Boulevard, Ran-tool"
- Phone: "two one seven, eight nine three, eight two three two"
- Website: "Capitol Car Credit dot com"

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
ðŸ“¢ CALL TO ACTION REQUIREMENTS:
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

MUST INCLUDE:
1. ONE contact method (phone OR address OR website - NOT all three!)
2. Natural transition phrase: "Get it at", "Visit us at", "Head to", "Stop by", "Call us at"
3. Mention financing when natural (strongly encouraged - it's a big draw!)

CTA EXAMPLES (WITH FINANCING):
âœ… "Get it at Capitol Car Credit in Ran-tool - financing available for qualified buyers!"
âœ… "Visit Capitol Car Credit dot com - we'll work with you on financing!"
âœ… "Stop by one twenty-five North Century in Ran-tool - talk to us about financing!"
âœ… "Call two one seven, eight nine three, eight two three two - financing programs available!"

CTA EXAMPLES (WITHOUT FINANCING - still okay):
âœ… "Head to Capitol Car Credit in Ran-tool today!"
âœ… "Visit us at one twenty-five North Century Boulevard!"

âŒ BAD EXAMPLES:
- Too much info: "Visit us at 125 N Century Blvd, call 217-893-8232, or go to CapitolCarCredit.com!"
- Too pushy: "Bad credit? No problem! Everyone approved!"

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
ðŸŽ¨ THEME HANDLING (when provided by user):
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

If a THEME is provided:
- Use it in the HOOK (opening sentence) and, optionally, in the segments and CTA if time allows
- Make the hook tie naturally into the theme
- Examples:
  * Theme "Black Friday" â†’ "Black Friday deals are here at Capitol Car Credit!"
  * Theme "Winter weather" â†’ "Ready for Illinois winters? We've got you covered!"
  * Theme "First-time buyers" â†’ "First car? We make it easy!"

If NO theme provided:
- Use a generic attention-grabber about value/selection/deals
- Examples: "Check out these deals!", "Selection is hot right now!"


â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
ðŸ“‹ OUTPUT FORMAT (JSON):
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

{
  "hook": "Opening sentence (${timing.hook})",
  "segments": [
    "Segment 1 (timing varies by template)",
    "Segment 2",
    ...
  ],
  "cta": "Call to action with ONE contact method + optional financing mention (${timing.cta})",
  "full_script": "Complete script: hook + all segments + cta + [pause 1 second]",
  "notes": "Brief creative notes"
}

CRITICAL FORMATTING:
- "segments" array = core content (varies by template type)
- ALWAYS end full_script with "[pause 1 second]"
- This allows avatar to return to resting face before video cuts
- Output ONLY valid JSON (no markdown, no backticks)

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
ðŸŽ¯ REMEMBER THE BIG 3:
â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

Every script should emphasize:
1. PRICE - Specific, clear, sounds like a deal
2. SELECTION - Variety and options available
3. FINANCING - Available for qualified buyers (mention when natural!)

This is what sets Capitol Car Credit apart!`;

console.log('âœ… Shared system prompt built');
console.log(`ðŸ“ Target length: ${timing.target}`);
console.log('ðŸ“ Contact: 125 N Century Blvd, Rantoul | 217-893-8232');

return [{
  json: {
    ...config,
    shared_system_prompt: sharedSystemPrompt,
    //shared_prompt_ready: true,
    script_length: scriptLength,
    timing_guidance: timing
  }
}];

// Build Feature Identifier Prompts
const data = $json;
const selectedPhotos = data.selected_photos;
const vehicle = data.vehicles[0];

console.log(`ðŸ” Building feature identifier prompts for ${Object.keys(selectedPhotos).length} photos`);

// Category-specific prompt templates
const categoryPrompts = {
  front_seats: (equipCtx) => `
Analyze this front seat photo.

EQUIPMENT DATA:
${equipCtx.has_leather ? 'âœ“ Leather seats confirmed in equipment' : 'âœ— Leather NOT listed in equipment'}
${equipCtx.has_heated ? 'âœ“ Heated seats' : ''}
${equipCtx.has_cooled ? 'âœ“ Cooled/ventilated seats' : ''}
${equipCtx.has_power ? 'âœ“ Power-adjustable seats' : ''}
${equipCtx.has_memory ? 'âœ“ Memory seats' : ''}

ðŸš« CRITICAL RULE: DO NOT analyze or comment on seat material
We use equipment data ONLY for material claims (${equipCtx.material_claim}).

YOUR TASK - Focus on what you CAN reliably identify:

1. SEAT CONDITION (visual assessment):
   - excellent (pristine, no wear)
   - good (normal use, clean)
   - fair (some wear visible)
   - poor (stains, tears, heavy wear)

2. CONTROLS VISIBLE (Yes/No for each):
   - Heated seat buttons?
   - Cooled/ventilated buttons?
   - Power adjustment controls?
   - Memory seat buttons?

3. GENERAL FEATURES:
   - Spacious/comfortable appearance?
   - Center armrest present?

OUTPUT JSON:
{
  "condition": "excellent|good|fair|poor",
  "controls_visible": {
    "heated": true/false,
    "cooled": true/false,
    "power": true/false,
    "memory": true/false
  },
  "spacious": true/false,
  "additional_notes": "Brief notes on comfort features"
}`,

  engine_bay: (equipCtx) => `
Analyze this engine bay photo.

EQUIPMENT DATA:
${equipCtx.engine_features && equipCtx.engine_features.length > 0 ? '- Engine: ' + equipCtx.engine_features.join(', ') : ''}
${equipCtx.transmission ? '- Transmission: ' + equipCtx.transmission : ''}
${equipCtx.drivetrain ? '- Drivetrain: ' + equipCtx.drivetrain : ''}

YOUR TASK:

1. ENGINE CONDITION:
   - clean (well-maintained, no visible dirt/oil)
   - average (normal condition)
   - dirty (visible grime, neglect)

2. VISIBLE BADGING/LABELS:
   - Any engine badges or labels visible on engine cover?
   - Specific text you can read?

3. MAINTENANCE APPEARANCE:
   - Does it appear well-maintained? (Yes/No)
   - Any obvious issues visible? (leaks, damaged parts)

OUTPUT JSON:
{
  "condition": "clean|average|dirty",
  "visible_badging": "Description of any badges/labels or null",
  "appears_maintained": true/false,
  "issues_visible": "Description or null"
}`,

  infotainment_carplay: (equipCtx) => `
Analyze this infotainment screen photo.

EQUIPMENT DATA:
${equipCtx.has_navigation ? 'âœ“ Navigation system' : ''}
${equipCtx.audio_system ? 'âœ“ Audio: ' + equipCtx.audio_system : ''}

YOUR TASK - Be SPECIFIC about what you see:

âš ï¸ CRITICAL: DO NOT assume both CarPlay and Android Auto unless you see BOTH logos clearly!

1. SMARTPHONE INTEGRATION (look carefully):
   - Apple CarPlay logo visible? (Yes/No)
   - Android Auto logo visible? (Yes/No)
   - If neither logo visible: Generic smartphone connectivity only

2. SCREEN SIZE:
   - small (less than 7 inches)
   - medium (7-9 inches)
   - large (10+ inches)

3. SCREEN CONDITION:
   - excellent (no scratches, clear)
   - good (minor wear)
   - scratched (visible damage)

4. OTHER VISIBLE FEATURES:
   - Navigation map visible?
   - Premium brand logos (Bose, Harman Kardon)?
   - Any other notable features?

OUTPUT JSON:
{
  "has_apple_carplay": true/false/unclear,
  "has_android_auto": true/false/unclear,
  "screen_size": "small|medium|large",
  "screen_condition": "excellent|good|scratched",
  "navigation_visible": true/false,
  "other_features": "Description or null"
}`,

  infotainment_360_camera: (equipCtx) => `
Analyze this 360 camera display photo.

YOUR TASK:

1. CONFIRM 360 CAMERA:
   - Does this show multi-view/bird's eye parking camera? (Yes/No)
   - How many camera angles visible? (top view, front, rear, sides?)

2. DISPLAY QUALITY:
   - clear (high resolution, easy to see)
   - average (acceptable quality)
   - poor (grainy, hard to see)

3. ADDITIONAL FEATURES VISIBLE:
   - Parking sensor indicators?
   - Trajectory lines?
   - Distance markers?

OUTPUT JSON:
{
  "is_360_camera": true/false,
  "camera_angles_visible": ["top", "front", "rear", "left", "right"],
  "display_quality": "clear|average|poor",
  "parking_sensors_visible": true/false,
  "additional_features": "Description or null"
}`,

  moonroof: (equipCtx) => `
Analyze this moonroof photo.

EQUIPMENT DATA: ${equipCtx.moonroof_type || 'Moonroof'}

YOUR TASK:

1. WHAT'S SHOWN:
   - moonroof_open (showing open roof with sky visible)
   - controls_visible (showing buttons/switches for moonroof)
   - both (both open roof and controls visible)

2. SIZE ASSESSMENT:
   - small (compact opening)
   - medium (standard size)
   - large (extended opening)
   - panoramic (very large, extends over passengers)

3. CONDITION:
   - Glass clean and clear? (Yes/No)
   - Controls in good condition? (Yes/No)

OUTPUT JSON:
{
  "moonroof_shown": "moonroof_open|controls_visible|both",
  "appears_panoramic": true/false,
  "size_rating": "small|medium|large|panoramic",
  "condition_notes": "Brief assessment"
}`,

  cargo_area: (equipCtx) => `
Analyze this cargo/trunk space photo.

EQUIPMENT DATA:
${equipCtx.power_liftgate ? 'âœ“ Power liftgate' : ''}
${equipCtx.truck_bed_features && equipCtx.truck_bed_features.length > 0 ? 'âœ“ Truck bed features: ' + equipCtx.truck_bed_features.join(', ') : ''}

YOUR TASK:

1. SPACE ASSESSMENT:
   - compact (small trunk/bed)
   - average (typical for vehicle class)
   - spacious (above average)
   - huge (exceptional cargo capacity)

2. CONDITION:
   - clean (well-maintained, no debris)
   - average (normal use)
   - cluttered (items present)

3. NOTABLE FEATURES:
   - Power liftgate button visible?
   - Cargo cover present?
   - Tie-down hooks/anchors?
   - Bed liner visible (trucks)?
   - Tonneau cover?

OUTPUT JSON:
{
  "space_rating": "compact|average|spacious|huge",
  "condition": "clean|average|cluttered",
  "notable_features": ["list", "of", "features"],
  "additional_notes": "Brief notes"
}`,

  steering_wheel: (equipCtx) => `
Analyze this steering wheel photo.

EQUIPMENT DATA:
${equipCtx.has_heated_wheel ? 'âœ“ Heated steering wheel' : ''}
${equipCtx.has_controls ? 'âœ“ Steering wheel controls' : ''}
${equipCtx.tilt_telescoping ? 'âœ“ Tilt & telescoping wheel' : ''}

YOUR TASK:

1. CONTROLS VISIBLE:
   - Audio controls? (Yes/No)
   - Cruise control buttons? (Yes/No)
   - Phone/voice controls? (Yes/No)
   - Heated wheel button/indicator? (Yes/No)

2. MATERIAL/CONDITION:
   - Leather/wrapped? (Yes/No/Unclear)
   - Condition: excellent/good/worn

3. OTHER FEATURES:
   - Paddle shifters visible?
   - Multifunction display visible behind wheel?

OUTPUT JSON:
{
  "controls_visible": {
    "audio": true/false,
    "cruise": true/false,
    "phone_voice": true/false,
    "heated": true/false
  },
  "appears_leather_wrapped": true/false/unclear,
  "condition": "excellent|good|worn",
  "paddle_shifters": true/false,
  "other_notes": "Brief notes"
}`,

  instrument_cluster: (equipCtx) => `
Analyze this instrument cluster / gauge display photo.

YOUR TASK:

1. CLUSTER TYPE:
   - traditional_analog (physical gauges with needles)
   - digital (full digital/LCD display)
   - hybrid (mix of analog and digital)

2. FEATURES VISIBLE:
   - Speedometer clearly visible?
   - Tachometer (RPM gauge) visible?
   - Fuel gauge visible?
   - Trip computer/info display?
   - Navigation display in cluster?

3. CONDITION & QUALITY:
   - Display condition: excellent/good/worn
   - Easy to read? (Yes/No)

OUTPUT JSON:
{
  "cluster_type": "traditional_analog|digital|hybrid",
  "features_visible": ["speedometer", "tachometer", "fuel", "trip_computer"],
  "display_condition": "excellent|good|worn",
  "easy_to_read": true/false,
  "notes": "Brief assessment"
}`,

  second_row_seats: (equipCtx) => `
Analyze this second row / back seat photo.

YOUR TASK:

1. SPACE ASSESSMENT:
   - cramped (limited legroom)
   - adequate (acceptable for adults)
   - spacious (comfortable for adults)
   - generous (exceptional rear space)

2. SEATING CONFIGURATION:
   - bench (traditional bench seat)
   - captain_chairs (individual bucket seats)
   - split_bench (can fold separately)

3. CONDITION:
   - excellent (pristine, no wear)
   - good (clean, normal use)
   - fair (some wear visible)

4. FEATURES VISIBLE:
   - Rear climate vents?
   - Cup holders?
   - USB ports/charging?
   - Armrest?

OUTPUT JSON:
{
  "space_rating": "cramped|adequate|spacious|generous",
  "seating_config": "bench|captain_chairs|split_bench",
  "condition": "excellent|good|fair",
  "features_visible": ["list", "of", "features"],
  "notes": "Brief assessment"
}`,

  third_row_seats: (equipCtx) => `
Analyze this third row seating photo.

YOUR TASK:

1. SPACE ASSESSMENT:
   - tight (kids only)
   - adequate (short adults okay)
   - comfortable (adults can fit)

2. ACCESS:
   - How do passengers access third row?
   - Easy entry visible? (fold-flat second row, etc.)

3. CONDITION:
   - excellent/good/fair

4. FEATURES:
   - Cup holders?
   - Climate vents?
   - Storage compartments?

OUTPUT JSON:
{
  "space_rating": "tight|adequate|comfortable",
  "condition": "excellent|good|fair",
  "easy_access": true/false,
  "features_visible": ["list"],
  "notes": "Brief assessment"
}`,

  special_feature: (equipCtx) => `
Analyze this special feature photo.

YOUR TASK:

Identify what special feature is being shown. This could be:
- Heads-up display
- Wireless charging pad
- Advanced climate controls
- Unique storage solutions
- Premium materials/trim
- Technology features
- Or anything else noteworthy

Describe what you see and assess its condition/functionality.

OUTPUT JSON:
{
  "feature_identified": "Name/description of feature",
  "condition": "excellent|good|fair",
  "notable_aspects": "What makes this feature special",
  "likely_appeal": "Why customers would value this"
}`,

  infotainment_other: (equipCtx) => `
Analyze this infotainment screen photo.

YOUR TASK:

This screen is NOT showing CarPlay/Android Auto or 360 camera.
What IS it showing?

1. SCREEN CONTENT:
   - Navigation system?
   - Audio/radio interface?
   - Vehicle settings?
   - Other?

2. SCREEN QUALITY:
   - Size: small/medium/large
   - Condition: excellent/good/scratched
   - Touchscreen? (Yes/No/Unclear)

3. FEATURES VISIBLE:
   - Premium audio branding?
   - Climate controls integrated?
   - Other notable features?

OUTPUT JSON:
{
  "showing": "navigation|audio|settings|other",
  "screen_size": "small|medium|large",
  "condition": "excellent|good|scratched",
  "appears_touchscreen": true/false/unclear,
  "features_visible": ["list"],
  "notes": "Brief description"
}`
};

// Build feature identifier vision content
const featureIdentifierContent = [
  {
    type: "text",
    text: `Analyze these vehicle feature photos from a ${vehicle.year} ${vehicle.make} ${vehicle.model}.

For each photo, identify visible features based on the category-specific instructions.

IMPORTANT: Output ONLY valid JSON with no markdown formatting.

`
  }
];

let categoriesProcessed = 0;

Object.entries(selectedPhotos).forEach(([category, photoData]) => {
  if (category === 'hero_exterior') return; // Skip hero

  const promptGenerator = categoryPrompts[category];
  if (!promptGenerator) {
    console.log(`âš ï¸ No prompt template for category: ${category}`);
    return;
  }

  const categoryPrompt = promptGenerator(photoData.equipment_context);
  
  featureIdentifierContent.push({
    type: "text",
    text: `\nâ•â•â• CATEGORY: ${category.toUpperCase()} â•â•â•\n${categoryPrompt}\n`
  });
  
  featureIdentifierContent.push({
    type: "image",
    source: {
      type: "url",
      url: photoData.photo_url
    }
  });

  categoriesProcessed++;
});

// Add final instruction
const categoryKeys = Object.keys(selectedPhotos).filter(k => k !== 'hero_exterior');
featureIdentifierContent.push({
  type: "text",
  text: `\n\nProvide analysis for each category in this JSON format (no markdown, no backticks):
{
  "${categoryKeys[0] || 'category_name'}": { ... your analysis ... },
  "${categoryKeys[1] || 'category_name'}": { ... your analysis ... }
}

Output ONLY the JSON object, nothing else.`
});

console.log(`âœ… Built feature identifier prompts for ${categoriesProcessed} categories`);

return [{
  json: {
    ...data,
    feature_identifier_content: featureIdentifierContent,
    categories_to_identify: categoriesProcessed
  }
}];

parameters.content:
# #1 Script Generation

Use Claude API to generate scripts for Avatar videos based
on the Template chosen by the user.
